casebody.data:
VILLAGE OF PINEHURST, NORTH CAROLINA, et al., petitioners,
v.
ESTATE OF Ronald H. ARMSTRONG, By and Through His Administratrix, Jinia Armstrong Lopez. No. 15-1380. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 3, 2016.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
